data.title: Good artisan pizza, attentive service, better than average hotel restaurant
data.text: Stopped in Sunday evening and sat in the bar.  Ordered beer and an artisan pizza with artichokes, chicken, spinach, onions, etc.  Pizza crust was excellent and very thin.  Server was very attentive and checked on us frequently.  We sat in bar and had to listen to some very loud patrons discussing philosophy but they finally left so we had some quiet.  If you want a quiet dinner or snack I would suggest staying out of the bar.  Also there were several TVs with sports on so depending on the event it could lively in the bar or annoying if you are not into that.  Looks like lots of people order their pizza.  Also ate here for breakfast and they gave me a take out tray so I loaded up an took it to my room.  Bacon was cooked well done which was very good, scrambled eggs had a little cheese on them and were cooked well and the muffins tasted fresh.  Better than average food for a hotel breakfast buffet at a Holiday Inn.

data.title: Hamburger
data.text:
Don't like it when they tell me how I must have my hamburger prepared.  

They do not seem to be interested in serving the food cooked to the customer request. Sounds like Big Brother!

They lost a customer!

data.title: Good food and OUR service was good, but it ends there
data.text:
Food was great, both my mom and I had a different pasta dish.  Our server was a younger thin man, unfortunately don't remember his name.  He did a nice job and the food came out fast.

The restaurant/bar was filthy, we were seated in the bar.  One of the servers was sitting on the opposite side of the bar, i'm not sure if she was off the clock or not, but she was loud and obnoxious.   Her choice of four letter words were appropriate for a blue collar bar after 3rd shift, but not for a restaurant attached to a hotel at 8pm.  Had I been there with children or my grandma, we would have left.

owner_response.author: Millie G, General Manager at Green Mill, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for taking the time to leave us a review. We're happy to hear you enjoyed our food and that you had great service. However, we're deeply sorry to hear about the remainder of your visit with us. Please contact us at info@greenmill.com so we can follow-up with you. Thanks!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Always Good
data.text:
It's been awhile, but every time I've been there, the food is good! 
Had a party there once and we went here for food.

owner_response.author: Millie G, General Manager at Green Mill, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thanks, Donna! We appreciate the great review and would love to have you come back in and join us for another delicious meal!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great pizza
data.text: Stayed at the hotel for an Amazon launch.  Great pizza and wings.  Also had the Walleye entree.  Aside from the tiny bones it was great.

owner_response.author: Millie G, General Manager at Green Mill, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thanks, Jim, for taking the time to share your review with us. We're thrilled to hear you had great pizza and wings with us. Please join us again soon for another meal!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Good food but...
data.text: The food and service were great but the entire meal I couldn't help stare at the grate above the kitchen, dust hangs off of it. I wondered how many meals had dust in them. Gross

owner_response.author: Millie G, General Manager at Green Mill, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for the review! We're pleased to hear you enjoyed our food and service, but we're sorry to hear about the view of our kitchen. Please contact us at info@greenmill.com so we can follow-up with you. Thanks!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Pizzabooger out on the town
data.text: Pizzabooger went back for a pizza at the green mill .The pizzabooger had a thin crust pizza and take it from the famous pizzabooger  it was another great visit great pizza and great service .So all you booger followers get out of that hotel room and go down and have a thin crust pizza and tell them the pizzabooger sent you.So tell next time booger out .

owner_response.author: Millie G, General Manager at Green Mill, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thanks for the great review! We appreciate the kind words and are thrilled to hear you enjoyed our pizza and service! Come visit us again soon!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Walleye
data.text: The service was well above average and the walleye was worth the price. The side where roasted potatoes and stemmed broccoli . The potatoes where excellently done.

owner_response.author: GMmgr1201, General Manager at Green Mill, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Hi Texfishing,
Thanks for letting us know you had a great experience dining with us!  Glad to know the service was great and that you loved the walleye dinner.  The KaBeelo Lodge Walleye is a great meal and a true value at that price.  Hope to see you back here soon!  Thanks.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Pizza
data.text: Pizzabooger returns to green mill and it was very visit .The pizza was very good and service was very good as always.Take it from the pizzabooger grab your car keys and drive over there and order a thin crust pizza and you won't be disappointed .Tell them the pizzabooger sent you!So for now booger out👃👃👃👃👃

owner_response.author: Millie G, Public Relations Manager at Green Mill, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Hi Pizzabooger, Thank you for taking the time to leave us a review. I am glad to hear you enjoy our pizza so much! We look forward to serving you again soon.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Good fun and friendly service
data.text: We were here in the evening for a couple drinks since we were staying in the hotel. We did not have any of the food, but the drinks were made on target (not too strong/not tasteless).  The bartenders/servers were very friendly and accommodating- the offered us food before shutting things down and made sure to offer us last call.  They let us know about the current drink specials and made our time pleasant.

owner_response.author: GMmgr1201, General Manager at Green Mill, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for the awesome review.  We are happy to hear that you had a great time in our bar!  With Happy Hours twice daily (3-6 and 9-midnight) and a different daily drink special there is always something happening at the Mill.  Next time you stop in you will definitely have to try the food.  Pizza is what put us on the map but we have lots of great food items to choose from.  We would love to become a regular stop for you when you're traveling through the cities.  Thanks again.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: very good eats
data.text: It was a pleasure to eat here breakfast and dinner items were very enjoyable. Onion rings were beautiful, eggs benedict  was excellent and a Green Mill in central Arkansas.

owner_response.author: GMmgr1201, General Manager at Green Mill, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Thanks Nohalo2016!
Not every Green Mill serves breakfast so it's great to hear that you loved ours!  We try to have a wide variety of menu items to choose from so that we hopefully have something for everyone!  The Eggs Benedict is a huge favorite with our homemade Hollandaise sauce and we are thrilled that you enjoyed it.    We do appreciate your dining with us for dinner as well.  Next time you stay with us let us know you're here and we can suggest some other great food items for you to try.  Thanks again.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great Za's
data.text: Great pizza, great service! The rewards program comes in very handy, especially on start up. Fun atmosphere, always televisions in bar and pretty quiet in the restaurant.

owner_response.author: GMmgr1201, Owner at Green Mill, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you Brett!   We are extremely happy that you had such a great time here at the Bloomington Green Mill.   Great food and great service is what we strive for so it means a lot when guests notice our commitment!  Glad to see you signed up for our Rewards program as now you will start to receive offers that are available only to members and only by e-mail.  We just came out with a new menu this week so it's a great time to stop back in and check it out! Thanks again and we look forward to serving you.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Excellent Food
data.text: Above expectations - Excellent variety - We dined here due to convenience of being connected to hotel, but would re-visit as a stand alone restaurant.

owner_response.author: GMmgr1201, Owner at Green Mill, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for the great review Harris B!  It's great to hear that we exceeded your expectations for excellent food!  We try hard to have a menu full of variety along with great customer service and we thank you for taking the time to let us know.  We hope you enjoyed your stay in the Holiday Inn as well and would love to have you stay and dine with us the next time your travels bring you back to Bloomington MN.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great Happy Hour!
data.text:
Went to eat here after returning from a trip (we used the hotels Park and Fly while we traveled). We had stayed at the Holiday Inn where the restaurant is located and wanted to eat before we headed home. 

The service was great and the food satisfied ages from 9 to 47! It was nice to have a menu to please everyone in the group.

Restaurant was clean and well maintained. They had a chef making pizzas out in an open area of the restaurant too. That's when you know your pizza is fresh! 

Prices are a bit high, but since we hit happy hour it was affordable fro a family of 4.

We would go back!

owner_response.author: GMmgr1201, Owner at Green Mill, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for the wonderful review!  We are pleased to hear that you and your family had a great time dining with us and everyone found something they liked.  We try hard to have a good variety of food on our menu so it's nice to see that it gets noticed.  Thanks also for choosing Holiday Inn for your travels.  Next time you're in the cities we would love to you have you stay and dine with us again!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Find a Different Place for Brunch
data.text: Met a group for there for Sunday Brunch - $13.99.  Very little to offer, dollar pancakes, no waffles.  There was a little ham and roast beef that I am sure were left over from another meal, overcooked and unappetizing.  The only fruit were two types of cut up melons, no other options.   Just  sugary muffins, no bagels or healthier option.   A corn dish and pasta, both of which looked like they were left over from something they served the day before.    Never again, don't waste you money!

owner_response.author: GMmgr1201, General Manager at Green Mill, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for commenting on your brunch experience.  We are sorry that our Brunch didn't meet your expectations.  We normally get great comments on our Sunday brunch and have quite a few regulars because of it, but clearly we dropped the ball during your visit.  I can assure you that everything on our buffet was made that day as we don't use leftovers.  We do have several types of muffins that would be a better fit than a sugary pastry as well as offering toast, or a bagel on request.  Your comments, while disappointing, will only make us better in the future.  Thank you for helping us improve.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Good food
data.text: The food here is good. My only complaint is that they don't sing "Happy Birthday" when it is a customers birthday. They do, however, give you a desert and meal on the house as a birthday gift.

owner_response.author: GMmgr1201, General Manager at Green Mill, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
We hope that you or your guests had a great Birthday, Kayla!  We are thrilled that you chose the Green Mill in Bloomington as the place to celebrate this special day!  I'm sorry that we didn't accommodate your request to sing.  It's not a normal birthday routine with us but we have sang in the past provided we have enough staff on hand to get some harmony!!
Thanks again for spending this birthday with us!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Not Bad
data.text: The food was very good.  Had their burger and it was cooked to perfection.  Others at our table had the Italian Meatloaf and Lobster Mac and Cheese and said it was good.  However, the hostess that seated us was very rude and impolite.  When I asked to be seated at a table instead of a booth she rudely said we only have large tables. I asked why we couldn't be seated at a table for six (we had two large men in our party) and she said, very rudely and in a snotty tone, "Fine."

owner_response.author: GMmgr1201, Owner at Green Mill, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thanks for the feedback on your recent dining experience here as well as emailing me with more details. I am glad that everyone in your group enjoyed their meals and service but am truly disappointed that my hostess was rude and impolite to you.  We have used your comments as a learning opportunity with the host staff so that this doesn't happen again.  Thank-you!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Terrible, terrible, terrible
data.text: We chose to eat dinner at 5:00pm on a Saturday.  Had we known the 12 people around the bar were going to be obliterated, obnoxious and extremely inappropriate, we would have gone some where else.  Adults, who seemed to be 50+ were hammered and EXTReMELY loud.   The bartender called them by name, taking a selfie with one guy behind the bar, flicking off the photo.  I understand we chose to sit at a bar, but did not expect this type of crowd at this time nor at Green Mill.  It's the last time we go here again.  Our waiter was fantastic.  We felt bad for him constantly having to maneuver around the people who had too much to drink.  Another guy was sitting on top of the bar being obnoxious.  The bartender enabled the behavior.  Go somewhere you can enjoy your food and company.  This place is a joke.

data.title: Tv
data.text: Great pizza they need more flat screen tv in the bar area so you can see the game and the the coat hanger on the booth get in the way of seeing the game with the few flat screen tv you have .

owner_response.author: GMmgr1201, General Manager at Green Mill, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thanks for the great rating!  Glad you loved the pizza!  We are currently exploring several different options for remodeling the bar, which will take place in the next year.  Getting more TVs and opening up the line of sight is a priority for us.  Thanks for taking the time to let us know how we're doing and what you would like to see from us.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Struck out with this place
data.text: I pre-ordered my meal via text to my colleague.  Decided on Desert Fire Pasta.  Bad decision.  The pasta was overcooked and the sauce was just too overwhelming and way to spicy.  I really didn't enjoy the meal at all.  I like their pizza so I will stick to that if I ever return.

owner_response.author: GMmgr1201, General Manager at Green Mill, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thanks for the feedback on your recent visit.  I am sorry to hear that you didn't like the Desert Fire pasta.  That is one of the most popular pastas on our menu and since the sauce is a combination of garlic cream and Hurricane sauce it can get very spicy...sometimes a bit too spicy!  The noodles should have been cooked al dente though and I'm sorry that yours were overcooked.  I also apologize that nobody offered to get you a different meal if you were unhappy with the first one.  I hope that you will give us another try the next time you are in the area.  We have many other pastas to choose from as well as pizza and other items.
owner_response.title: Owner Response
